entry.title: The increase of max block size should be determined by block height instead of block time
entry.summary: On December 18, 2015, Jorge Tim√≥n via bitcoin-dev proposed two options to improve the Bitcoin network's block time. One option is to use nHeight while the other is to utilize the median time from the previous block. A user commented that median time-based schemes should use median time past and tie the rule to wall clock time for planning purposes. The message was signed using PGP signature.
